title: Well... Thought I would AMA this place up!

replies.body: Why did you pick your IGN
replies.body_tagged: Why did you pick your IGN

replies.body:
How do you like your potatoes served?
If you were a food, what would you be and why?
What's your favorite color and why?

Enjoy x3
replies.body_tagged:
How do you like your potatoes served?
If you were a food, what would you be and why?

Enjoy x3

replies.body: Well my first IGN was Spooks_9900 and I picked that because 1)  I was enjoying a book series called Spooks (this was a long time ago xD) and 2) I liked the number combination. This new username was unfortunately not picked by me as someone got onto my account and decided to change the name... I will change it to something related to spooks again when the 30 days is up.

replies.body: Erm... Probably baked/ I would be a croissant because. I eat so many of them/ blue because I support Chelsea (in football or soccer as some call it)
